definition: to repay a favor/to give back/feedback
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: For it is just as when I feed myself – I don't expect to be rewarded.
sentences.chinese: 就像自己給自己餵飯一樣，從來不會希求回饋或善報。

sentences.english: Negative feedback and not being appreciated demotivates me.
sentences.chinese: 消極的回饋，不被欣賞，讓我沮喪。

sentences.english: Visit on a Sunday or ask for cashback at the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 週日再來或是在超市要求現金回饋。

sentences.english: I often say to people that producing is the best paid form of cowardice.
sentences.chinese: 我常跟人說，“製作”是對懦弱的最佳回饋方式。

sentences.english: The RMS will pick this up before it gets to the client application.
sentences.chinese: 回饋到達客戶端應用後，將由RMS接收。

sentences.english: Log into Ebates or rebate site of your choice.
sentences.chinese: 登陸Ebates或者你選擇的回饋站點。

sentences.english: Specialized donation groups or thrift stores will have other methods of giving back to the community.
sentences.chinese: 專門的捐贈組織或舊貨店有其他的途徑回饋社區。

sentences.english: Collecting the various countries fans' feedback and report back to the Cloud staff.
sentences.chinese: 收集各個國家球迷的回饋和報告回雲的工作人員。

sentences.english: Answer questions and build your product with their feedback.
sentences.chinese: 回答問題並基於他們的回饋來創建你的產品。

sentences.english: With you as educational czar or czarina, feedback becomes your friend and guide.
sentences.chinese: 你作爲教育沙皇或女皇，回饋將變成你的朋友和導師。

sentences.english: There are feedbacks or new knowledge from others after individuals express their opinions.
sentences.chinese: 當夥伴表達他們的見解後，會得到意見或新知識回饋。

sentences.english: In this case, incentives could entice people to provide feedback.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，獎勵可以吸引公衆提供回饋。

sentences.english: This kind of community feedback has been a big help in solidifying the software.
sentences.chinese: 像這樣的社區回饋給了項目極大的幫助。

sentences.english: The president would no doubt then reward former warlords who supported him with jobs and spoils.
sentences.chinese: 無疑卡爾扎伊之後會以部分官職回饋軍閥對他的支持。

sentences.english: The obligation for human to reciprocate the environment is the requirement of eco-justice.
sentences.chinese: 環境回饋義務也是生態正義的要求。

sentences.english: Service data related to vehicle, compile and feedback to CSD.
sentences.chinese: 編寫並向CSD回饋有關車輛的服務信息。

definition: to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to show concern and care for
variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
